quest.name: Styled a Hero
journal: Livingway is eager to show you more of the moon's wonders.
objectives: Speak with the jubilant Loporrit while wearing your new attire.
Speak with Livingway while wearing your new attire.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I hate to admit it, but...I did rather like the carrots.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Hmm...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: While I'm sure the Loporrits would hop at the chance to expound upon carrots in exhaustive detail, perhaps it's time we moved on?

dialogue.name: COOKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Hungry for more carrots? Fear not, you can eat to your heart's content after you've seen the rest of Bestways Burrow.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: I think we've had our fill of carrots for now. Let's move on to other necessities, shall we?

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Our clothing production is sure to impress. This way!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: It's hardly Sunsilk Tapestries, but perhaps we'll be pleasantly surprised.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Garments born of the heavens, crafted with methods ancient and forgotten. Dress befitting we who walk in shade, stewards of the esoteric...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Do you suppose the clothes they prepared will be as grossly oversized as the carrots?

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Here we are─the apparel production station.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: We've chosen to employ more traditional methods for this task─creation magicks!

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Hydaelyn, in Her infinite wisdom, blessed us with the selfsame affinity for magic Her people possessed. We have other amazing talents, of course─and I know you're dying to hear about them─but I will regale you with the details another time.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: That said, we did run into a spot of trouble at first. Our magic alone was not sufficient to see our work done.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: In the end, we discovered crystallized aether was a wonderful catalyst that could provide us with the extra vis we needed.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: My, how resourceful.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ah, the sweet sound of recognition! You will also be impressed to hear we've read all about your habit of changing attire to match your chosen profession. For the sake of efficiency, I presume? This has also been taken into account with our designs.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: But why take my word for it when you can simply try on our clothes?

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Make yourselves known to the workers and they will see to the rest!

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: If you're worried about sizing, don't be. It should be a simple matter to adjust our concepts as required...and it will be required.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: Ah! I-It's you! One of the visitors from Etheirys! Goodness me, Mappingway wasn't kidding─you're barely taller than we areyou really are smaller than the watcher.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: Oh, right! You're here to try on a set of clothes, yes?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: What would you have me fashion for you today?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: An outfit that embodies my bloodlust.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Something simple, yet functional.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: A fashionable and refined ensemble.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: Embodies your...what?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: Simple and functional. Right.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: Fashionable... Right...

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: Ahem. This will only take a moment.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: There we are. All finished!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: A perfect fit, if I do say so myself.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: I would be lying if I said I understand what bloodlust is, but I assume it's something you enjoy. I made certain the clothes are flexible yet sturdy enough to endure...whatever it is you plan to do while wearing them.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: Nothing too billowy or frilly, as you can see. Also light and durable─sure to serve you well wherever your travels might take you!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: I'll be honest─I know nothing of fashion, let alone fashion on Etheirys. B-But I'd wager no one down there has ever worn anything like this fine ensemble. Perhaps you can start a new trend!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: Would you look at that. Speechless! And there I thought you may not like it.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: If you've a mind to try something else, why not speak with my fellow artisans?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: I'm sure they'd be happy to oblige.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must continue wearing these garments in order to progress.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will change back to your normal garments if you move too far away. Look to your map for the garment change's area of effect.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Speak with the restless Loporrit to restore or prolong the garment change.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: Oh no! What happened to your outfit? Not to worry, I have another right here.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: A fresh change of clothes? Say no more!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: Ah! N-No one said you'd be coming! Could you give me a moment to clean up my station?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must be wearing garments provided by the restless Loporrit in order to progress.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: Ah! N-No one said you'd be coming! Er...how can I help you?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: You wish to try my clothes? Really?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: O-Of course! It would be my honor! Did you have anything in mind?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Got anything with a little more...flair?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I'm looking for clothes with an altogether different design.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Surprise me!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: I-I think I can handle that. Let's see...

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: This should do!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: Some of my best work yet.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: Times and tastes truly have changed. It used to be so rare for anyone to request clothing with a focus on form over function.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: Thankfully, I had a spare concept for robes made using a different fabric. I think it looks rather fetching.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: You're a strange one, aren't you? I honestly wasn't sure what to do when you didn't ask for anything specific.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: I take my work seriously, however, and am never one to disappoint. That ensemble is a blend of concepts from myriad professions─all-purpose attire for the modern womanman of Etheirys!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: It's a relatively new concept incorporating an idea that's never been tried with clothing before.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: Fragrance! Can you smell the carrots? <sniff> <sniff> Ah, simply divine!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: I was worried how the concept would turn out when put to the proof, but it looks stunning on you!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: Won't you go and show Livingway? I'm sure she's eager to see what we've come up with.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must continue wearing these garments in order to progress.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will change back to your normal garments if you move too far away. Look to your map for the garment change's area of effect.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Speak with the jubilant Loporrit to restore or prolong the garment change.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: What happened to my concept? No matter─I can fix this!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITB04403
dialogue.text: Looking for a fresh set, are we? Here you go.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITA04403
dialogue.text: The people of Etheirys are sure to love that concept.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh? What happened to the change of wardrobe?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must be wearing garments provided by the jubilant Loporrit in order to progress.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: My, don't we look splendid!

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: The result of much trial and error, but I know quality work when I see it.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Shhh. You needn't speak. I can see your adoration for the moon and we Loporrits in your eyes. No doubt your friends feel the same having sampled our creations.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Sorry to have kept you waiting...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: They insisted we sample all of their concepts ere we returned.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Verily, 'tis an ensemble most becoming.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: ...I think it's past time we returned these clothes.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: I was so confident our garments would meet with your approval... <sigh> Whatever are we doing wrong?

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: The watcher taught us that, in his time, everyone wore the same robes. To do otherwise was against social etiquette.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: We thought we could appeal to modern tastes by tailoring the robes to specific professions, but...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Please, you mustn't be so hard on yourself. Should we resort to evacuating the people of Etheirys, they will most certainly have need of your attire.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: 'Tis clear you spared no effort in addressing our needs, but you must understand that we are not quite so...homogenous.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Speaking for myself, what I wear now better suits my tastes, even if it is of inferior make.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: But there are others whose choices may be influenced by traditions or personal experience. Rather than make assumptions for the whole, you must consider the individual and their potential preferences.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: I fear we've underestimated the complexity and diversity of your people. <sigh> Even if we'd memorized every tome we received, I doubt we'd have fared much better.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Maybe we're doing you a disservice trying to shower you with our baubles and frippery, thinking it was for your benefit when you'd be better off on your own...

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: ...There are some who might agree. People who prefer to keep others at arm's length, even when they know they shouldn't.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: As one such former fool, I'd like to ask you a question.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: This plan to evacuate and escape the Final Days─did it account for the reflections of the Source as well?

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Um... Not that I'm aware of...

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: We were born of Hydaelyn's love for Etheirys, and the salvation of the people on that star, and that star alone, has ever been our aim.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Surely it's better to devote ourselves to saving one world than to divide our efforts across fourteen, and risk failing them all?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: ...I suppose you're right.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Livingway, might we have leave to explore Bestways Burrow unattended? You have given us much to think about.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Why, certainly.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Until later, then.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: If I may, I should like to accompany thee a while longer.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Really!?

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: I-I mean, you're more than welcome to. There was actually something I wished to speak with you about.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Let's be off then, shall we?

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: (-Fidgeting Loporrit-)Hmmm......

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ahhh! M-My apologies. I wasn't trying to spy or anything.

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: Everyone's been talking about the visitors come from Etheirys, and I wanted to see what all the fuss was about.

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: I was excited at first, but now...now I'm worried.

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: What if the people of Etheirys refuse to come? What if we can't save them!?

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: <sigh> It's clear we've made a mess of things.

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh, but wait! You still haven't visited the domiciles! Once you see them, you'll understand how wonderful the moon truly is, I'm sure of it.

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: (-Growingway-)I'll be waiting for you by the teleporter near the entrance. Oh, and the name's Growingway, by the way. See you soon!

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: You're here! You're really here!

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: Thank you! Thank you so much, uh...er... Sorry, what should I call you?

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: Forename Surname, eh? Crikey, even your names are amazing.

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: Well, Forename, we'll be using this teleporter to enter the residential area.

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: Whenever you're ready.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Proceed to the residential area?

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: Gosh, that was embarrassing. I promise to be more careful from now on.

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: Since the residential quarters are closed for now, I've rerouted the teleporter to allow travel between floors instead. Hopefully it proves useful in the meantime.

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: <sigh> A shame you couldn't see it, though. You really would've liked it.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can now travel between the upper and lower floors of Bestways Burrow via the teleporter.
